name: Voyage From Helheim
description:
<>A solo project and an entry for both of the One Button Jams. 

Voyage From Helheim is a rouge-like action game where you must defeat hordes of monsters on sea while slowly ascending to Valhalla.

You have only one action button which is used by either Mouse or Space.

This game is meant as a fail and learn experience so be mindful of that.

Special thanks to both of the Hosts of the jams for allowing us to make fun games with their themes!

<>All of the assets were made by me in a week.
